Class CCLoggerCategory

  • java.lang.Object

        • gw.api.system.CCLoggerCategory

  • public class CCLoggerCategory
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.logging.PLLoggerCategory
    Exposes internal CCLoggerCategory constants to customers.

      • createLogger

        protected static org.slf4j.Logger createLogger(java.lang.String name)
        Static method - create and register a logger with a certain name
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the logger
        Returns:
        the logger instance

      • createLogger

        protected static org.slf4j.Logger createLogger(org.slf4j.Logger base,
                                               java.lang.String subLogger)
        Static method - create a sublogger of existing logger. Note. The base parameter is intentionally defined as Object, so it could be anything that has toString() method returning a name.
        Parameters:
        base - - existing Logger or Logger name
        subLogger - - a subname to be concatenated with a period delimiter
        Returns:
        the logger instance
